description: A Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to split their body into pieces and control them independently. The user becomes immune to slashing attacks.

userHistory.circumstance: Accidentally consumed when Shanks surprised Buggy while he was hiding the fruit, intending to sell it for 100,000,000 Belly

abilities.name: Bara Bara Festival
abilities.description: The user sends their separated body parts flying in all directions to attack opponents from multiple angles simultaneously.

abilities.name: Body Separation
abilities.description: The user can separate their body into multiple pieces and control them independently, making them immune to slashing attacks.

weaknesses.description: While Buggy can separate his body parts and make them fly, his feet must remain on the ground.
Cannot swim and is weakened by seawater and Seastone.

reveals.information: Buggy accidentally ate this fruit when Shanks surprised him, causing him to lose both his swimming ability and his treasure map
Buggy had planned to sell the fruit for 100,000,000 Belly

description: A Paramecia-type Devil Fruit that gives the user's body the properties of rubber, allowing them to stretch, bounce, and be immune to blunt attacks and electricity.

abilities.name: Gomu Gomu no Bazooka
abilities.description: Luffy stretches both arms far back and then hurls them forward with a double open palm strike, sending opponents flying with tremendous force. This technique ranks as the 5th most popular of Luffy's attacks in fan polls.

abilities.name: Gomu Gomu no Pistol
abilities.description: Luffy stretches his arm back and launches a powerful punch.

weaknesses.description: Cannot swim and is weakened by seawater and Seastone.

reveals.information: Gomu Gomu no Bazooka technique debuts
